channel.title: Help with form combo boxes
channel.description:
i need help using combo boxes in scripts
1)checking to see which option is selected 2)using them like as "if" options here is an example for checkboxes you use [scar] if(powerchopcheck.state=cbchecked)then begin powerchop:=true; [/scar] can i do something like that with combo boxes? also i need help with the same thing using listboxes thanks! if you would like to talk on msn contact me plz bbri06@hotmail.com

item.title: Help with form combo boxes
item.dc:creator: @bbri06 bbri06
item.description:
@bbri06 wrote:

ahhh makes sense thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: Help with form combo boxes
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

For which option is selected you do:

Writeln(ComboBox1.text);
if (ComboBox1.text = 'no') then x:= false;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with form combo boxes
item.dc:creator: @bbri06 bbri06
item.description:
@bbri06 wrote:

i need help using combo boxes in scripts

1)checking to see which option is selected
2)using them like as “if” options here is an example
for checkboxes you use
[scar]
if(powerchopcheck.state=cbchecked)then
begin
powerchop:=true;
[/scar]
can i do something like that with combo boxes?
also i need help with the same thing using listboxes thanks!
if you would like to talk on msn contact me plz
bbri06@hotmail.com

Read full topic
